methods.name: mint
methods.desc: mint pool tokens given some amount of asset A and asset B

methods.name: burn
methods.desc: burn pool tokens to get back some amount of asset A and asset B

methods.name: swap
methods.desc: Swap some amount of either asset A or asset B for the other

methods.name: set_governor
methods.desc: sets the governor of the contract, may only be called by the current governor

methods.name: bootstrap
methods.desc: bootstraps the contract by opting into the assets and creating the pool token

methods.name: fund
methods.desc: fund the contract with some asset A and asset B, separate from normal `mint` since it uses a slightly different initial formula for minting tokens
